tool_description: Github Data Scraper is a great way to access Github repos
name: Ernesto Github API Scraper
title: Ernesto Github API Scraper

api_list.name: Get the top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.description: Get the top 30 of Github repos based on a query
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ernesto-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/search_top30/rails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ernesto-github-api-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
